dmca.title: Image Site Claims Linking is Theft
dmca.body:
If you do not stop displaying links to individual movies from my galleries immediately, you will be sued for stealing my bandwith. Please do not bother telling me I cannot, you will be the fourth successful lawsuit I have taken on. I pay for the bandwith that is used when my movies are watched and I have every right to CHOOSE where MY content is displayed. Just because I submit to Video-Post does not automatically mean my movies are free for others to post on their sites. I pay for my bandwith, it's not free and I have every right to choose where my content is displayed.

Please do not make me prove myself to you, I do not think you could afford even the punitive damages I could get from you placing direct links to my movies instead of ONLY a link to a web page. Please feel free to contact an attorney about this. Ask him if there is any way I could sue you for bandwith theft resulting from you linking directly to my movies....ask him if it makes it worse that you are doing so for profit. You can take this seriously or suffer the consequences. You have till the end of the day to remove any direct movie links from the domains http://www.got-xxx.com and http://www.allpornvideos.com and http://www.allfetishxxx.com 

                                                                      Dragon
